traits.name: Death Burst
entries: When the rime hulk dies, it explodes in a 10-foot-radius sphere of frigid air and frost centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The rime hulk makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) cold damage.

actions.name: Trail of Frost {@recharge 5}
entries: The rime hulk moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks and can move through the space of any Medium or smaller creature. Each time the rime hulk enters another creature's space for the first time during this move, that creature must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 (4d10 damage) cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the rime hulk's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.
